title: ghana naya
sahitya:
ghananaya dEshika gAna rasika shikhAmaNi nIyE kandA enakkaruL nIyE
innam



anupallavi



kaninaya sholporuL ghana gambhIram ininaya shrutiyODiyai laya dhIra



caraNam



SaDja riSabhapriya gAndhAra madhyama pancama dhaivata niSAda vida
sapta svara sangIta kavi kunjaradAsan anavaratam tarum ninnaruL maya
